General.Name: Pettenati S.A. Industria Têxtil
General.Description: Pettenati S.A. Industria Têxtil manufactures and sells textile products for men, women, children, and babies in Brazil and internationally. The company provides products in the fashion, casual, sport, nightwear, active/fitness, and intimate line segments. The company was formerly known as Pettenati S/A " Indústria de Malhas e Confecções and changed its name to Pettenati S.A. Industria Têxtil in 1992. Pettenati S.A. Industria Têxtil was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Caxias do Sul, Brazil.
General.Address: Rodovia RSC 453 - Km 2,4 -s/n, Caxias Do Sul, RS, Brazil, 95010-550
